homepage.hero_headline: Every AI answer. One platform. Full transparency.
homepage.hero_subheadline: Ask a question — get answers from all leading AI models. Oneseek compares, verifies and synthesizes with real-time Swedish data sources.
homepage.capabilities_subtitle: Every feature is designed to give you a better, more reliable answer.
homepage.cap_compare_desc: Ask a question. Get answers from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek and more. Oneseek synthesizes the best answer with source citations.
homepage.cap_debate_desc: Multiple AI models debate your question in 3 rounds. Random speaker order. Oneseek summarizes and selects the most well-founded answer.
homepage.cap_transparency_desc: See the entire reasoning chain: question → API calls → analysis → answer. All raw data, all intermediate steps, clickable and verifiable.
homepage.cap_realtime_desc: Oneseek dynamically selects from 13 Swedish data sources: SCB, SMHI, Bolagsverket, Trafikverket and more. Never outdated answers.
homepage.api_section_subtitle: Oneseek integrates with Swedish authorities and APIs in real-time for verified, up-to-date answers.
homepage.pipeline_subtitle: Every question flows through 23 nodes — from intent to verified answer. Every step visible and configurable.
homepage.pipeline_node_count: {count} nodes in the pipeline — every step is configurable and observable.
homepage.gn_resolve_intent_d: Classifies the question and determines complexity (trivial/simple/complex). Builds speculative candidates in hybrid mode.
homepage.gn_memory_context_d: Loads episodic memory and conversation history for cross-session context.
homepage.gn_smalltalk_d: Fast conversation path for casual greetings — no tool calls needed.
homepage.gn_speculative_d: Pre-computes likely tools in parallel during hybrid mode for complex queries.
homepage.gn_agent_resolver_d: Retrieves and selects agents via vector retrieval and LLM ranking.
homepage.gn_planner_d: Creates executable plan (max 4 steps) based on selected agents.
homepage.gn_planner_hitl_d: Human-in-the-loop: pauses for user approval of the plan.
homepage.gn_tool_resolver_d: Matches plan steps to tools via vector retrieval (Bigtool).
homepage.gn_speculative_merge_d: Merges speculative tool candidates with actual resolve data.
homepage.gn_execution_router_d: Determines execution strategy: inline, parallel, or subagent per branch.
homepage.gn_domain_planner_d: LLM-driven micro-plan per domain agent: which sub-tools and execution order.
homepage.gn_execution_hitl_d: Human-in-the-loop: pauses for approval before tool execution.
homepage.gn_executor_d: LLM step that generates responses or tool_calls via function calling.
homepage.gn_tools_d: Runs tool stamps: SMHI, SCB, Trafikverket, sandbox, etc.
homepage.gn_post_tools_d: Post-processing of tool results: extraction, plan updates, artifacts.
homepage.gn_artifact_indexer_d: Indexes artifacts (files, data) for future reference and offloading.
homepage.gn_context_compactor_d: Compresses context via rolling summaries within token budget.
homepage.gn_orch_guard_d: Loop guard: protection against infinite loops, agent-hop counting, progressive pruning.
homepage.gn_critic_d: Evaluates answer quality: ok → synthesis, needs_more → more data, replan → new plan.
homepage.gn_synthesis_hitl_d: Human-in-the-loop: pauses for approval before final delivery.
homepage.gn_progressive_synth_d: Incremental streaming synthesis for complex multi-step answers.
homepage.gn_synthesizer_d: Final refinement and formatting of the response with sources and citations.
homepage.gn_response_layer_d: Selects presentation format: knowledge, analysis, synthesis, or visualization.
homepage.providers_subtitle: Oneseek compares answers from all leading AI models in real-time.
homepage.tc_title:
Travel back in time.
Verify what AI said — and why.
homepage.tc_description: Oneseek Time Capsule tracks how AI answers change over time. Every response, every context, every model version — saved in an immutable timeline. Detect bias shifts, manipulation and hidden changes before they become problems.
homepage.tc_point_1: Immutable history — every response saved with full context and model version
homepage.tc_point_2: Drift detection — automatic alerts when model behavior changes unexpectedly
homepage.tc_point_3: Audit-proof — cryptographically verifiable chain for legal, medical and financial use
homepage.tc_alert: ⚠ Drift level critical — manual review recommended
homepage.podcast_title:
Your question.
Multiple voices.
A really good podcast.
homepage.podcast_description: Ask any question. Multiple AI models with distinct personalities, perspectives and sometimes completely different conclusions debate your question — like a living podcast tailored just for you.
homepage.podcast_point_1: Multiple distinct voices with unique characters and perspectives
homepage.podcast_point_2: Natural dialogue — interruptions, counter-arguments and sharp debate
homepage.podcast_point_3: Listen on your walk or read the transcript when you want to dig deeper
homepage.podcast_point_4: The same question can produce entirely different podcasts depending on the models
homepage.podcast_episode_title: Is AGI near — or are we stuck in hype?
homepage.podcast_line_1: We're seeing exponential capability growth. Multimodal models already solve tasks that required specialists two years ago.
homepage.podcast_line_2: But there's an important distinction between capability and generality. Solving benchmarks isn't the same as real understanding.
homepage.podcast_line_3: Exactly. And if we look at energy consumption and costs — where's the sustainability analysis? Nobody's talking about it.
homepage.podcast_line_4: Wait, but the progress in reasoning models over the last 12 months has been remarkable. Chain-of-thought—
homepage.podcast_line_5: I want to throw in another angle. Maybe the question itself is wrong. We should ask: AGI for whom? In what context?
homepage.podcast_line_6: That's actually a brilliant observation. The definition of AGI shifts depending on who owns the narrative.
homepage.tr_title:
See the full chain of thought.
Verify. Trust.
homepage.tr_description: Fully visible reasoning tree — from your question through API calls, intermediate analyses and raw data to the final answer. Every step hashed and blockchain-anchored. Nobody can retroactively change what the model actually thought.
homepage.tr_point_1: Clickable steps — from question to raw API calls to final answer
homepage.tr_point_2: Blockchain anchoring — every step hashed and stored decentralized
homepage.tr_point_3: Cryptographic verification — prove to auditors and lawyers that data is intact
homepage.tr_step_1: Question: How does the new tax law affect freelancers?
homepage.tr_step_2: API calls → Tax Authority, SCB, Parliament
homepage.tr_step_3: Raw data: 3 sources, 847 data points fetched
homepage.cta_description: Experience Sweden's most transparent AI search platform. Compare, verify and trust the answers.
homepage.hero_title_part1: Every AI answer. One platform. Full transparency.
homepage.hero_description: meta-search + answer verification + bias analysis + model comparison
homepage.integrations_subtitle: Integrate with your team's most important tools
homepage.features_subtitle: Powerful features designed to enhance collaboration, boost productivity, and streamline your workflow.
homepage.feature_workflow_desc: Centralize all your knowledge and resources in one intelligent workspace. Find what you need instantly and accelerate decision-making.
homepage.feature_collaboration_desc: Work together effortlessly with real-time collaboration tools that keep your entire team aligned.
homepage.feature_customizable_desc: Choose from 100+ leading LLMs and seamlessly call any model on demand.

find_ask_act.description: Get instant information, detailed updates, and cited answers across company and personal knowledge.

real_time_collab.title: Work Together in Real Time

context_counts.title: Context Where It Counts
